name: Haides Education
slogan: Introduce a digital education platform for aspiring barbers & stylists to elevate their skills.
description: Helping students succeed in the real world as industry professionals. Explore a wide range of courses that are available to all levels of experience.

name: Cannadiscount
slogan: Cannadiscount is one of Vancouver's most trusted online cannabis dispensaries.
description: Providing a digital platform for local businesses to thrive and capitalize on e-commerce opportunities in the market.

name: Unlikely Citizen
slogan: Built on the Webflow platform for hosting a local e-commerce storefront for unique scents and other ‘unlikely’ goods.
description: Established in 2020, Unlikely Citizen’s goals stayed the same. Create a ‘badass’ community where everyone is welcome.
